#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long

ll all_xor(ll n){
    if(n % 2 == 1){
        if(n % 4 == 1)  return 1;
        else return 0;
    }
    else{
        if(n % 4 == 0)  return n;
        else return n + 1;
    }
}

ll xor_even(ll n){
    return (all_xor(n / 2) * 2);
}

ll xor_odd(ll n){
    return (all_xor(n) ^ xor_even(n - 1));
}

void solve(){
    ll x, m, ans;
    cin>>x>>m;

    ans = all_xor(x + (2 * m) - 2) ^ all_xor(x - 1);
    if(x % 2 == 0)  ans ^= (xor_odd(x + (2 * m) - 3) ^ xor_odd(x - 1));
    else ans ^= (xor_even(x + (2 * m) - 3) ^ xor_even(x - 1));

    if(x == 0 and m == 0)  ans = 0;

    if(ans == 0)    cout<<"BOB"<<endl;
    else cout<<"ALICE"<<endl;
}

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)  solve();
    return 0;
}
